name: Minesweeper: Submerged
description:
[ Modifications ]

  • Create a complete, interesting, comprehensive, and coherent level.
  • Modify the out-of-game menus in some significant and meaningful way.
  • Reskin the existing graphics in some significant way, such as changing the player or an enemy to a completely different character.
  • Add multiple additional levels and tie them in to create a logical progression in your game. (NOTE: Each level should be unique in some way, such as different types of challenges for the player.)

Credits:

Just Me, Mohamed Ahmed
